# Automation with Snakemake {#snakemake}

## Introduction to workflows {#workflows}

A workflow is in essence a series of independent, repeatable tasks, each with well-defined inputs,
parameters, and outputs. This help users perform a complex work by organizing a series of steps, so
that files become available for more than one step at a time.
